Empowering Pathology with
Digital Precision.

Maureen Waithaka is an experienced medical doctor with specialization in pathology. She is a passionate medical educator and a digital pathology innovator. She foresees a future where all patients in Kenya, on the continent, and beyond have access to good quality and affordable pathology resources.

An alumnus of Aga Khan University Hospital competitive and peer-approved anatomic pathology residency program, she has worked both in Kenya and Namibia honing histopathology diagnostic skills.
